name: Slimmy Jhonny Adventure
description:
1. Slimmy Jhonhny Adventure

 This game is an arcade game, it´s objective is to be a puzzle and a platformer game, you will be launched like in a pinball game, you will be able to move around, through the map, completting objectives while some objects are actively thrown at you on the most unexpeted places by bouncing around, teletransporting you, avoiding obstacles  shooting you from a cannon and others unexpected challenges.

(W, D)  Player Movement 

(Space bar) Lunch / Doble Jump 

(Esc) Pause

Unlook doors.

Explore the map

Complete levels

Game Jam + 2022

Made by

Cristian Rojas Conejo

Julián Echandi Echeverri

José Pablo Cruz Vásquez
